question: Comet Encke orbits the sun every 70 years. Bob's father saw the Comet when he was 24 years old. Bob saw the comet a second time when he was three times the age his father was when he saw the Comet. How old was Bob when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Bob saw the Comet for the second time when he was 24 years * 3= <<24*3=72>>72 years old.
Comet Encke can be seen every 70 years, so Bob saw the comet for the first time when he was 72 years - 70 years = <<72-70=2>>2 years old.
#### 2
